授業目的: This is a survey course on the modern history of Chinese immigration to Japan starting from the mid 19th century and ending in the early 21st century.
到達目標: Students will gain basic historical and socio-anthropological knowledge of Chinese immigration to Japan in modern times.
特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（中国人移民）（CIEC）/The Chinese in Modern Japan（国際学部）

トピック.授業計画1: This course will cover the historical, social, and cultural dimension of Chinese immigration to Japan in modern times.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly readings and writing assignments will be announced in class.
